my copy of this months NCJSC mag and was salivating over the Yagyu 
collection, as well as the description of all of the Kodogu and Koshirae 
in the back but ohhhhh were are all the pictures LOL.

So, does anyone have a rough idea when the NBTHK A will be releasing the 
book ?????

cheers all

Rich

p.s. Both Gordon and Jim look very dappa in their mug shots :-) Nice to 
finally put a face to all the emails Jim.
